ladybug_vtk.vtkjs.helper moduleÂ¶

This module helps in embedding vtkjs data in Paraview Glance HTML.

This module is originally developed by Kitware and can be found at the following link. https://github.com/Kitware/VTK/blob/master/Web/Python/vtkmodules/web/vtkjs_helper.py
